cause.description:
Gingers are constantly bulied. Put an end to this unfair treatment! Hug a ginger today!
1. Gingers are people too.
2. Gingers should be accepted in society.
3. You shouldn't be afriad to be friends with a ginger
4. You should not fear ginger hair dye.
cause.mission: Make gingers accepted in everyday society.
cause.name: Save the gingers.
